title: Evil Dragon Reincarnation ~Even If I Am Reincarnated into the Other World I Am I~ - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Seinen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Carefree Protagonist   Demon Lord   Demons   Dragons   Elves   Handsome Male Lead   Humanoid Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Reincarnated as a Monster   Shapeshifters   S*aves   Strong Love Interests   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World
author: Seto Meguru   瀬戸メグル
description:
There was a nameless man who worked as a corporate slave, one day he died miserably in an accident. But when he woke up he became an evil dragon in a different world. The man thinks. “Hmm, then this means I don’t need to work, do I?”

He became the strongest creature at the level that even demon king and hero couldn’t compete with him at all, so that man decided to live as leisurely as he liked.>
